pluggable.name: Share Draft
pluggable.author: Owen Winkler
Morgante Pell
The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Share private and unpublished posts with a simple link.

help.value: After the plugin is installed, a new section on the post page will present you with a private link to share the post. Anyone you give that link to will be able to view the post regardless of its permissions, including if it is unpublished.
